actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Operations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security

official_title: To amend chapter 11 of title 31, United States Code, to require that the annual budget submitted by the President includes a statement of revenues obtained from the sale, lease, and transfer of Government assets, and for other purposes.
short_title: Federal Investment Recovery, Economic Security and Liquidation Examination and Disclosure Act

summary.text: Federal Investment Recovery, Economic Security and Liquidation Examination and Disclosure Act - Amends Federal law to require the President to include in the annual budget a statement of projected revenues obtained from the anticipated sale, lease, and transfer of Government assets and the estimated price at which the assets would be sold in the private sector.

titles.title: Federal Investment Recovery, Economic Security and Liquidation Examination and Disclosure Act

To amend chapter 11 of title 31, United States Code, to require that the annual budget submitted by the President includes a statement of revenues obtained from the sale, lease, and transfer of Government assets, and for other purposes.
